summary: Data from the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention indicate that kids were involved in about 1,500 of the more than 36,000 gun-related deaths in 2015 about 61% of gun deaths across all ages were suicides By some estimates, there are guns in about a third of U.S. homes. We identified 16 public or nonprofit programs that promote safe gun storage to help keep those...
title: Personal Firearms: Programs that Promote Safe Storage and Research on Their Effectiveness
